mapper.select: select count(*) from UserBlackList where EndDate like sysdate
mapper.insert: insert into UserBlackList(UserId,seq,EndDate) values (#{UserId},(select nvl (max(seq),0) +1 from UserBlackList),sysdate+#{date})
mapper.update: update UserBlackList set EndDate = (select EndDate from UserBlackList where UserId = #{UserId})+#{date} where UserId = #{UserId}
